summary: Do you want your males looks less muscular? Do you want to get rid of the detailed abs? Then this mod is for you!
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3][center]MILKDRINKER MALE TEXTURES[/center]
[center][color=#ffff00]To prevent "yu r a stupeed gay" comments: I'm a girl. But why would any troll read this? I'm just wasting my time.[/color][/center][center][/center]

[center][url=https://flic.kr/p/oHhTA1][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5595/14907120560_97d52146bc_c.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

About the mod[/size][/b]

I've created this mod because I have some not so masculin male characters and I didn't like them having so detailed abs. That's the backstory, now about the textures!

They are normal maps only, which means you can use them any textures you like - even with hairy ones. It will only replace the malebody_1_msn.dds file. I made ones for [i]Better males[/i] bodies and one pack for[i] Schlongs of Skyrim[/i] body.


[b][size=3]The versions[/size][/b]

I made one version for each [i]Better males[/i] body - sundracon, favoredsoul and fs erect. For [i]SoS[/i], which I'm actually using, I made 4 versions. You can take a look at the comparison picture of the normal maps, but maybe the differencs are not so visible, so I write them down:

[list][*]version 1: this one has a bit more abs than the others. The chest is smoothened a bit.
[/*][*][size=2][/size]
[/*][*]version 2: smooth belly, smooth back and veins removed from the armes.
[/*][*][size=2][/size]
[/*][*]version 3: only the belly is smoothened.
[/*][*][size=2][/size]
[/*][*]version 4: the less muscular one, everything is smoothened, veins removed (this is the closest to the [i]Better males[/i] version).
[/*][*]
[/*][/list]
[b][size=3]Requirements[/size][/b]

You will need a [i]Better males[/i] or[i] Schlongs of Skyrim[/i] (google) body and a fitting textureset. Nothing else.

[color=#ffff00][size=3][b]Recommanded:[/b][/size]

My other mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58390/?]a slimmer, more femine male body for SoS.[/url]
[/color]
[b][size=3]
Install[/size][/b]

Just copy and paste the folders and click OK to rewrite existing files.Backup your original textures first!
Don't mix and match bodies and textures, there will be strange issues! Use only the fitting textures for the bodies!


[color=#ffd966][size=3][center]Future plans:
New male texture
Adopting some popular female textures to male bodies
New male bodies, fitting the less muscular textures (for SoS)[/center][/size][/color]


[i][b]Credits[/b]
[/i][i]Bethesda Studios for TESV: Skyrim
[/i][i]Vectorplexus, Smurf and b3lisario for Schlongs of Skyrim
[/i][i]Chris57 and Favoredsoul for Better males
[/i][i]Hellosanta for SG female textures
[/i][i]Jay Faircloth, Shinglescat and Cocoacup for the help

[/i]
[i][size=4][center][color=#00ff00]If you like this mod, don't forget to upload screenshots![/color][/center][/size][/i]
author: Fiszi
